title: Concealed carry permits (CCW/CHL)
dataVerified: Permit holder name, DOB, photo, permit number, issuing authority
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake CCW permits. Domain binding verifies issuing authority (sheriff, state police). Law enforcement verification. Reciprocity verification (interstate). For privacy, issuers can add a random salt line to raise entropy and defeat guessing attacks.
